about_the_game:
• The original soundtrack to The Chronicles of Dragon Wing is 68 minutes of exploring.
  • It also featured some tracks that were not included in the game.
  • All tracks are in mp3 format.

Tracks

  • 01.The Chronicles of Dragon Wing
  • 02.The Shadow of Magical Amethyst
  • 03.The Crusade of Baroque
  • 04.The Requiem of Ares
  • 05.The Surge of Undercurrent
  • 06.The Rest of My Life
  • 07.Prelude of Battle
  • 08.Journey of The Combat
  • 09.Death is Coming
  • 10.Death Desert_Intro
  • 11.Death Desert_Normal
  • 12.Death Desert_Tough
  • 13.Fire Desert_Intro
  • 14.Fire Desert_Normal
  • 15.Fire Desert_Tough
  • 16.Square Desert_Intro
  • 17.Square Desert_Normal
  • 18.Square Desert_Tough
  • 19.Fog Forest_Intro
  • 20.Fog Forest_Normal
  • 21.Fog Forest_Tough
  • 22.Random Forest_Intro
  • 23.Random Forest_Normal
  • 24.Random Forest_Tough
  • 25.Endless Forest_Intro
  • 26.Endless Forest_Normal
  • 27.Endless Forest_Tough
  • 28.Ancient Ruins_Intro
  • 29.Ancient Ruins_Normal
  • 30.Ancient Ruins_Tough
  • 31.Rose Arena_Intro

  • 34.Silver Field_Intro

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7,10（32or64bit）
  • Processor: Intel Core I3-7100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 480, Intel® HD Graphics 4400, ATI Radeon™ HD 5000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
